title: Ticket #7649: Limit number of threads for R jobs
description: I was investigating why BaTLab builds were running slowly in CHTC. It turns out that many R processes were overloading the system. It turns out that R looks at OMP_THREAD_LIMIT to limit cores and we do not set that environment variable. So, let's add it.
check_ins: 2020-May-21 09:01   Check-in [59700]: (#7649) Add OMP_THREAD_LIMIT to list of env vars that starter sets (By Tim Theisen )
